SEARCH
Package com.kohlschutter.stringhold

Interface IOExceptionHandler

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface IOExceptionHandler
An exception handler to handle IOExceptions in String-building methods. NOTE: prefer the static versions over implementations. Only use implementations when you need additional side effects.
Author:
Christian Kohlsch√ºtter

    Field
    Description
    static final IOExceptionHandler
    EMPTY
    Return an empty string (do not flush if possible), or at least don't add anything new.
    static final IOExceptionHandler
    EXCEPTION_MESSAGE
    Return the exception message (without stacktrace); if possible, do not flush/include what has been written so far.
    static final IOExceptionHandler
    FLUSH
    Return what has been written so far.
    static final IOExceptionHandler
    ILLEGAL_STATE
    Throw an IllegalStateException, as this exception should not have happened.
    static final IOExceptionHandler
    STACKTRACE
    Return what has been written so far, and add the exception message with stack trace.
